brief: This is an application that can be used to book a stay at a private home.
This is an application that can be used to write and save notes.
This application allows the user to get info on select movies and can check if a movie is currently playing in nearby theaters and it will display its showtimes.
This is an application that allows users to be more organized, and schedule their meals weekly.
This is the ASCO SDP testing center. This project currently has three sections. Which, consists of a study review section, and Two POP-Quizes.
By using a third-party API, I built a weather dashboard that will run in the browser and show real time weather conditions for all Major and some minor cities.
This is my portfolio that was created using HTML and CSS.
This is an application that an employee can use to generate a random password based on criteria they've selected.
This is an application that allows users to take a timed quiz, and allowing the user to save their score into the local storage.
This is an application is a simple calendar application that allows a user to save events for each hour of a typical working day (9amâ€“5pm).
